content: That's a great list! I'm particularly interested in **Hana Yori Dango** and **Death Note**. I've heard a lot about them and my cousin, who's studying abroad, also recommended them to me when we were discussing our favorite TV shows. We actually had a really deep conversation about our personal struggles and it was really nice to connect with someone on that level. Do you think **Death Note** is suitable for someone who doesn't usually watch thrillers?
